results.title: Strange residues
results.creator_credit: Fetus Ferguson, Norman Neeson, Alexander Proyas and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
When a strange batch of unlabelled records start arriving in record shops, customers are drawn irresistably to them. But when played, they cause weird dreams which turn the dreamers into zombies. What are these records? Are they the work of alien beings from another planet, using dreams to manipulate mankind? What is the true story?
A reporter examines this unusual situation.

results.title: The Rentman
results.creator_credit: Peter Flynn, Ross Hutchens and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A rent collector for the Housing Commission (low cost public housing) calls on one of his tenants, an elderly Aboriginal woman, for their regular cup of tea together. In the past he has protected her against the bureaucracy of the state housing system, but this visit is different.

results.creator_credit: Simon White, Mark Lewis and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A man shoots at a woman making a television commercial and finds that a television camera is covering the whole event. Cast features John Derum and Julie McGregor.

results.title: Tran the man
results.creator_credit: Siobhan Hannan, Rowan Woods and AFTRS
results.brief_description: Ray Moss has been nicknamed “Tran” by his Asian workmates in his job as a security guard at a shopping centre in suburban Cabramatta. For Ray, the heat is on. His brother Donny and Uncle Jack have had their heroin business undercut by Asian-controlled competition in Cabramatta and Donny and Jack want Ray as their go-between. Cast features David Wenham as Ray/”Tran”.

results.title: The Space between the door and the floor
results.creator_credit: Andrew O'Sullivan, Pauline Chan and AFTRS
results.brief_description: He sits alone in his office waiting for the girl of his dreams. When she comes, he will see her approach in the space between the bottom of the door and the floor. He lights a cigarette and waits … In the space between the door and the floor there lies a sliver of light in a dark world of fantasy and desire.
results.title_for_label: The Space between the door and the floor

results.title: Tread softly
results.creator_credit: Rolf De Heer, Di Drew and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Claire (Robyn Nevin) and Angela (Natalie Bate) have only been been living together for a short time but Claire’s constant attention has already become suffocating to Angela. She needs space and time to be alone.
The painful final stages of an affair that is over but not yet finished.
